1. Mayor's Office

Mayor's Office
==============

Learn more about Mayor Franklin
-------------------------------

Mayor Cassie Franklin took office on Jan. 1, 2018.
Learn more about her
and her vision for Everett.

Mayor Franklin’s priorities
---------------------------

Mayor Franklin's priorities are violence prevention, behavioral health and creating a prosperous city. To learn more about these critical priorities and how they guide the City’s work, check out her annual
State of Everett
address and her Mayoral Directives.

Contact the Mayor
-----------------

Please
complete this form
to share concerns, provide feedback or ask a question.

Invite the Mayor to an Event
----------------------------

Please
complete this form
to invite the Mayor to an event.
